mapper.insert: INSERT INTO booking(bseq, rseq, email, ckindate, ckoutdate, price, payment, status) VALUES(book_seq.NEXTVAL, #{resq}, #{email}, #{ckindate}, #{ckoutdate}, #{price}, #{payment}, #{status})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM booking_view WHERE name=#{name} AND email=#{email}
mapper.update: UPDATE booking SET rseq=#{rseq}, ckindate=#{ckindate}, ckoutdate=#{ckoutdate} WHERE bseq=#{bseq}
